values.description: Base URL for the API. Change to your deployment URL for staging/production.
JWT access token. Automatically populated after login/register.
JWT refresh token. Automatically populated after login/register.
Current user's UUID. Automatically populated after login/register.
Task UUID for testing task endpoints. Populated after creating a task.
Journal entry UUID for testing journal endpoints. Populated after creating an entry.
Daily plan UUID. Populated after confirming a daily plan.
RevenueCat webhook authorization secret for testing webhook endpoints.
